result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for providing a Redis client configuration and connection setup, including TLS support and Prometheus metrics integration.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating Redis client functionality and configuration in a single file, promoting reusability and separation of concerns.

pkg/redis/redis.go.purpose: This file provides a Redis client configuration and connection setup, including TLS support and Prometheus metrics integration.
side_effects: Logs connection attempts and errors to Redis server
Registers a Prometheus collector for Redis metrics
risks: Insecure TLS configuration if InsecureSkipVerify is true
Potential exposure of sensitive information if logs are not managed properly
